title: Blazor: Run C# in the browser
thumbnailDescription: Blazor: Run C# in the browser
sessionTitle: Blazor: Run C# in the browser
eventDescription: ​​Blazor is a new experimental framework from Microsoft that uses web assembly to run a .NET framework inside the browser. This talk covers getting started with Blazor, before demonstrating its capabilities and readiness for typical line of business applications by building a UI over the venerable Northwind database.
description: ​​Blazor is a new experimental framework from Microsoft that uses web assembly to run a .NET framework inside the browser. This talk covers getting started with Blazor, before demonstrating its capabilities and readiness for typical line of business applications by building a UI over the venerable Northwind database.
